attributes.title: Why YOU Should Watch Hat Films in 2020!
attributes.description:
Thank you so much for watching our videos and supporting us!

#HatFilms #Announcement #2020

attributes.title: Becoming an E-Boy!
attributes.description: We've been set the challenge to 'Become An E-boy' - We're not allowed to google what this involves and we have 1 hour to grab what we need and present our 'look' to the judges! What could an E-boy even mean? It's probably down to your interpretation, if you've even heard of the term before, we haven't until this video. We hope you enjoy our antics, we wanted to come back from our short break away with something fun and silly to set the tone for some of our real-life videos coming up on the channel. Thanks for being patient with us while we're sorting this transition out and please go and check our 'Hat Gaming' channel for all your gaming needs. We've cleaned up our vods so they're free of donation read-outs and sub sounds as well as having highly edited cut-down videos showing just the best bits for you.

attributes.title: The Duct Tape Dog House Challenge!
attributes.description: The dog needs a new home! We don't want mochi to go cross-eyed staring at rightmove or zoopla so we're each making her a home she can be proud to live in. The only caveat is that we need to make them out of duct tape, mostly. We head to the big orange square to get the goods and even treat mochi to a trip to pets at home so we can maybe find some inspo! If you're wondering where our gaming content is, it's now over at Hat Gaming (formerly Hat Films Extra) we've got clean vods (without donations or annoying sounds), we've got montage cut downs and we've even got a new GTA playlist you might've missed. We're still working on making all of this streamlined along with creating IRL videos on this channel.

attributes.title: We test out homemade HAZMAT suits!
attributes.description: Ross recently saw the hit documentary* film 'Outbreak' and realised that we aren't protected against any kind of viruses that might plague our office at any given time. Best thing to do is to create the perfect hazmat suits to help us fend off any potential issues! Who will create the optimum hazardous material protection suit out of the limited resources we have?If you're wondering where our gaming content is, it's now over at Hat Gaming (formerly Hat Films Extra) we've got clean vods (without donations or annoying sounds), we've got montage cut downs and we've even got a new GTA playlist you might've missed. We're still working on making all of this streamlined along with creating IRL videos on this channel.

attributes.title: YOU FLINCH, YOU GET SHOCKED!
attributes.description: We were inspired by the many challenges online to create a very janky but perfectly safe birthday video where Chris Trott was never in any kind of dnger whatsoever. Anyways Trott's 32 years old now so go wish him a happy birthday and enjoy our little silly challenge for the day. As always, check out our Hat Gaming channel for more gaming content from us. Much love and many kisses, the hat films writer of this description. - If you actually read this please type 'lemur' in the comments. No one ever reads these things so i'm doing a test. HAPPY BIRTHDAY TROTTY!

attributes.title: Making PANCAKES In A War Zone!
attributes.description: It's Pancake Day! Since we started this channel we've kept up with the bizarre tradition of celebrating Pancake Day in the weirdest possible ways. Make sure to check out all of our other Pancake Day videos if ou fancy a laugh

attributes.title: Our Self-Isolation Vlog
attributes.description: So, the UK is on a lock down and we're self-isolating right now. We wanted to update you on what we're up to during this time as we're unable to utilise our office or warehouse for the time being. We'll try and see if there are good ways to make content for this channel during this situation. We'll be able to stream over on our Twitch which will now be edited down into videos for our Hat Gaming channel. Please give them a try and see if there's anything on our new gaming channel that you'd want to subscribe for. If you have any ideas for us to do while we're isolated, leave a comment and we'll see what we can do. Otherwise, stay safe, stay at home and help slow this spread where possible. Thanks so much for supporting us, we've made some big changes this year and we're now adapting to even bigger changes now. Much love - Hat Films

attributes.title: We Attempt to Make Bon Appètit's Gourmet Krispy Kreme Doughnuts
attributes.description: We make our own attempt at creating Krispy Kreme doughnuts using Bon Appètit's Gourmet recipe, from a series I can't recommend more where Claire Saffitz recreates popular snacks with a gourmet twist. This seemed like something we could achieve, and it's also something we can do whilst we're isolated so check out our fumbled attempts and vote in the comments which one you liked the most! Enjoy and please like/share this video if you enjoyed it!

attributes.title: THE HAT VS GAMESHOW!
attributes.description: Whilst stuck indoors we host our own isolation game show!

attributes.title: The Quiz Show of Everything!
attributes.description: Settle down and prepare yourself for the Quiz Show of EVERYTHING, and by everything we mean other, better  game show elements, mixed into a giant quiz-like cocktail of fun! If you love Deal or No Deal, The Price is Right, The Generation Game, Wheel of Fortune, Golden Balls, Million Pound Drop and our very own 'What Is That?' then you'll hopefully enjoy our little Hat VS quiz.

attributes.title: Smith's Birthday Lockdown Survival Challenge!
attributes.description: Smith managed to avoid a birthday challenge video last year and with the current circumstances we didn't want him to miss out again. So to celebrate his Birthday this year Smith must complete a Lockdown Survival Challenge!
